name: DX-Ball 2: 20th Anniversary Edition
description:
After more than 5 million downloads, the king of break-out games is back in a special 20th Anniversary Edition. Seumas McNally's fan-favourite DX-Ball 2 has been updated for modern PCs while retaining all of the classic brick-breaking action and unique graphic style of the late 90's original.

Features:
  • 150 Boards from the original Board Pack 1 (aka Full Version) plus an all-new anniversary boardset.
  • 20 classic power-ups including multi-ball, fireball, lasers, and more.
  • Play locally against your friends with hot-seat multi-player.
  • Compete online with new online leaderboards.
  • Create and share custom boardsets with included editing tools.
